title: 97/458/EC: Commission Decision of 1 July 1997 amending Decision 97/272/EC on protective measures with regard to fishery products originating in Kenya (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 1 July 1997 amending Decision 97/272/EC on protective measures with regard to fishery products originating in Kenya (Text with EEA relevance) (97/458/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 5 of Commission Decision 97/272/EC, the date of 30 June 1997 shall be replaced by 28 February 1998.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 162, 1. 7. 1996, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 108, 25. 4. 1997, p. 48.
